name: Keep Hope Alive (Vawer, Olocomeu)
description:
Keep hope alive as you try to figure out how to escape this cave.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 46 Jam under the theme "keep it alive".

Created by:

Paulo Gonçalves (Olocomeu)

Gabriel da Motta (Vawer)

We didn't manage to put a proper ending, but when you leave the cave thats it.

1.01 fix for the Javascript error at the flaming machine.

The tile set used is Caves Of Gallet by Adam Saltsman.

The Font Pixelated by Skylar Park was used.

Sound effects made with ChipTone, Bfxr, Bosca Ceoil.

Made with Unity.
